CustomField.formula: IF( ISPICKVAL(CaseLanguage__c, 'it'), IMAGE('/resource/1692889823000/ItalianFlag', 'it_flag error', -1, -1) , IF( ISPICKVAL(CaseLanguage__c, 'de'), IMAGE('/resource/1692889917000/GermanFlag','de_flag error', -1, -1) , IF( ISPICKVAL(CaseLanguage__c, 'fr'), IMAGE('/resource/1692889850000/FrenchFlag','fr_flag error', -1, -1) , IF( ISPICKVAL(CaseLanguage__c, 'ko'), IMAGE('/resource/1692889888000/KoreanFlag','ko_flag error', -1, -1) , IF( OR(ISPICKVAL(CaseLanguage__c, 'en'),ISPICKVAL(CaseLanguage__c, 'gb')), IMAGE('/resource/1692889862000/EnglishFlag','en_flag error', -1, -1) , IF( OR(ISPICKVAL(CaseLanguage__c, 'ja'),ISPICKVAL(CaseLanguage__c, 'jp')), IMAGE('/resource/1692889833000/JapaneseFlag','jp_flag error', -1, -1) , IF( ISPICKVAL(CaseLanguage__c, 'us'), IMAGE('/resource/1692889862000/EnglishFlag','us_flag error', -1, -1) , IF( OR(ISPICKVAL(CaseLanguage__c, 'zh'),ISPICKVAL(CaseLanguage__c, 'zh-Hant')), IMAGE('/resource/1692889876000/ChinaFlag','zh_flag error', -1, -1) , IF( ISPICKVAL(CaseLanguage__c, 'es'), IMAGE('/resource/1692889904000/SpanishFlag', 'es_Flag', -1, -1) , '' )))))))))
CustomField.label: Language
